Red color is controlled by a dominant gene B, and brown color by the recessive allele b. Complete aPunnett square for adihybridcross involving a homozygous checkered red bird and a plain brown bird. For this cross, show the expected phenotypes, genotypes, genotypic frequencies and phenotypic ratios for the F_2 generation. A. Phenotypic ratio: checkered red 6, checkered brown 2, plain red 6, plain brown 2
